data.name: XCopyTableListener
desc: specifies the interface required to listen for progress in copying table rows via a CopyTableWizard.

methods.name: copiedRow
desc: is called when a row was successfully copied.
This method is called right after a row has been successfully copied. It might be used, for instance, to update a progress indicator.

methods.name: copyRowError
desc: is called when copying a row failed.

methods.name: copyingRow
desc: is called when a row is about to be copied.
This method is called immediately before a row is copied. It might be used, for instance, to update a progress indicator.
